name: Home Medical Equipment Specialists LLC
specialty: Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies, Oxygen Equipment & Supplies

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Home Medical Equipment Specialists LLC is a Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies, Oxygen Equipment & Supplies provider based in Albuquerque, NM. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $100.0M in Medicaid payments across 1.5M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $100.0M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,503 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
